Player History
Injured on 5/14/2002 with a Blister On Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/23/2002 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Won World Series with Toronto in 2003...
Drafted in 7th round, 169th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2011...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 2/28/2014 (Going to CHN: LF J. Whitmarsh. Going to BAL: 1B W. Withrow, P J. Brooks)...
Injured on 6/15/2014 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/22/2014 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2018, off Jordan Zimmerman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2018, off Danny Hultzen (ATL)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2018, hitting .265 with 23 HR, 99 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pittsburgh on 7/30/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2019, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Atlanta in 1977...
Injured on 5/1/1977 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/12/1977 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/1980 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
